name: BUG RUSH (AndresTapa)
description:
Video Game for the Gameoff 2021.

The theme is about bugs,  we (a friend and I) thought about a strategy game where waves of enemys rush a base, then we thought, what if the base is the enemy and we are the waves. So we came  up with this game, you have to manage your coins,  win more and beat all the levels.

It's a bit buggy but it's our first game jam, we had a lot of fun doing it, and we hope you  enjoi it playing as well.

This is the GitHub repository if you want to check out the files: Github
